main event: An object was sighted moving erratically at 20 degrees above the horizon and disappeared at 20 degrees below the horizon. It reappeared momentarily 15 minutes later.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,The object was tracked via ground radar,The object was reported to be moving in an unusual orbiting motion,There is speculation that the object may have been a satellite,The report was sourced from military observations.
witness description: military personnel observing from ground radar
